Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Basket

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Basket
public class Basket extends Object
This class contains the information and the methods that can be called on the game's bag. The number of students in the bag are collected in an array, divided by color in the following order: PINK, GREEN, BLUE, YELLOW, RED

  • Constructor Details

    • Basket

      public Basket(int[] studentsNum)
      Constructor creates a new basket, whose number of students are specified in the array given as input.
      Parameters:
      studentsNum - : array of integers indicating the students numbers, divided by color.

  • Method Details

    • pickStudent

      public Color pickStudent()
      This method allows the extraction of a student tile from the basket. The color is randomly chosen according to the current weight of each color.
      Returns:
      a new student instance.

    • putStudent

      public void putStudent(Color color)
      This method manages the insertion of a new student.
      Parameters:
      color - : instance of the color that must be added to the basket.

    • weightedRandomIndex

      private int weightedRandomIndex()
      This private method generates in weighted-random way a color index from which it will be picked a new student
      Returns:
      the index of the student's color

    • getStudentsNum

      public int[] getStudentsNum()
      Method that returns the number of students that are in the basket
      Returns:
      array of integers indicate the students number, divided by colors

    • getSize

      public int getSize()
      Method that returns the size of the basket

      integer that rapresents the size of the basket
